thread.title: BRIEF-EJT Investment Ups Price In Tender For Tarczynski Shares To 14 Zloty/Shr

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-EJT Investment Ups Price In Tender For Tarczynski Shares To 14 Zloty/Shr
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - TARCZYNSKI SA
* EJT INVESTMENT UPS PURCHASE PRICE IN TENDER OFFER FOR 6 MILLION SHARES OF TARCZYNSKI TO 14 ZLOTYS PER SHARE FROM 12.60 ZLOTYS PER SHARE, SAY INTERMEDIARIES IN TENDER
* FUNDS HOLDING SHARES OF TARCZYNSKI DECLARED EARLIER THIS MONTH THAT PURCHASE PRICE OF 12.60 ZLOTYS PER SHARE DOES NOT REFLECT FAIR VALUE OF COMPANY
Source text: bit.ly/2oi1RmN
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
